root.title: Azure VPN Connection Modified or Deleted
root.description: Identifies when a VPN connection is modified or deleted.
root.author: Austin Songer @austinsonger

falsepositives.item: VPN Connection being modified or deleted may be performed by a system administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
VPN Connection modified or deleted from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
